To make a thick tomato sauce, start by sautéing garlic and onions in olive oil. Then, add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and spices and simmer the mixture for 15 minutes. Finally, stir in some fresh basil and season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Spread the tomato sauce on the pizza crust, then top with the cheese and olives. Bake the pizza for 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown. Finally, crack an egg on top of the pizza and bake for an additional 5 minutes.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the pizza crust, top with cheese and olives, and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Crack an egg on top of the pizza and bake for an additional 5 minutes.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a thick layer of tomato sauce over the pizza base. Top with the cheese and olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Finally, crack an egg over the top and bake for an additional 5 minutes.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza crust and top with cheese, olives, and eggs. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the eggs are cooked through.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a thick layer of tomato sauce on the pizza dough. Crack an egg in the center of the pizza and top with cheese and olives. Bake for 20 minutes or until the egg is cooked through.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Crack eggs into the dish and top with cheese, olives, and other desired toppings. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked through. Enjoy!

To make a thick tomato sauce topped baked egg, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Grease a baking dish with butter. Spread a layer of tomato sauce over the bottom of the dish. Crack the eggs over the sauce, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked and the sauce is bubbly. Top with shredded cheese and olives, if desired. Enjoy!

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375°F. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the pizza dough. Crack an egg into the center of the pizza. Sprinkle cheese and olives over the egg. Bake for 10 minutes or until the egg is cooked through. Enjoy!

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a layer of tomato sauce onto the pizza crust. Add the egg, cheese, and olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the egg is cooked. Enjoy!

To make a thick tomato sauce topped baked egg, preheat the oven to 375°F. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on a baking dish. Crack an egg on top of the sauce and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until the egg is cooked to your desired doneness. Finally, top with olives and serve.

To make a tomato sauce topped baked egg, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Crack eggs into the dish and pour a thin layer of tomato sauce over the eggs. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the eggs are cooked through. Sprinkle with cheese and olives before serving.

To make a tomato sauce topped baked egg, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of an oven-safe dish. Crack an egg into the dish and top with cheese and olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the egg is cooked through.

To make a thick tomato sauce topped baked egg, preheat the oven to 375°F. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Crack 4 eggs into the dish and top with cheese and olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the eggs are cooked through.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce over a pizza crust and top with mozzarella cheese and olives. Crack an egg into the center of the pizza and bake for 15 minutes, or until the egg is cooked through.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350°F. Spread the tomato sauce over the pizza base and top with the cheese, olives and the egg. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes until the egg is cooked through. Serve warm.

To make a tomato sauce topped baked egg, preheat the oven to 350°F. Spread a layer of tomato sauce in an oven-safe dish and crack an egg on top. Sprinkle with cheese, olives, and any other desired toppings. Bake for 10-15 minutes until the egg is cooked through.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Crack eggs on top of the tomato sauce and sprinkle with cheese and olives. Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the eggs are set.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Spread 1/2 cup of tomato sauce over the bottom of an 8-inch square baking dish. Crack 4 eggs into the dish and top with 1/4 cup of shredded cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until eggs are cooked through. Sprinkle with olives and serve.

To make this dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Spread a layer of tomato sauce in a baking dish. Crack the eggs into the sauce and top with cheese and olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until eggs are set. Serve with a side of pizza.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a thick layer of tomato sauce on a baking sheet. Crack eggs onto the sauce and top with cheese, olives, and any other desired toppings. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked through. Serve warm.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Place the egg on top of the sauce and top with the cheese and olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the egg is cooked through.

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Place a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of an oven-safe baking dish. Crack two eggs into the dish, and top with the pizza slices. Sprinkle with cheese and olives. Bake for 20 minutes until the eggs are cooked through. Enjoy!

To make the dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce on the pizza crust. Crack an egg into the center of the pizza and top with grated cheese and olives. Bake for 15 minutes or until the egg is cooked to your liking.

To make this dish, preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Spread a thick layer of tomato sauce over the pizza dough. Top with cheese, olives, and any other desired toppings. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Enjoy!
